description: This virus is classified in the BSL 2 category. This Human adenovirus 1 is preserved under Viral Storage Medium -80C.Tests for the presence of mycoplasmae were positive.  Adenoviruses (members of the family Adenoviridae) are medium-sized (90–100 nm), nonenveloped (without an outer lipid bilayer) viruses with an icosahedral nucleocapsid containing a double stranded DNA genome. Their name derives from their initial isolation from human adenoids in 1953.
name: Adenovirus 1 antigen
